ur_rna.StructureEditor.services.drawing

Class ScreenShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • ur_rna.StructureEditor.services.drawing.ScreenShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScreenObject

    public class ScreenShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScreenObject
    Represents an object drawn onscreen that is meant to be interacted with by the user.

      • getBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
        Specified by:
        getBounds in interface IScreenObject
        Returns:
        Returns the bounds of this screen object (in screen coordinates) The bounds should NOT include any additional selection border or buffer zone.

      • getModel

        public java.lang.Object getModel()
        Specified by:
        getModel in interface IScreenObject
        Returns:
        Returns the model-space object that is represented by this screen object.

      • getZOrder

        public int getZOrder()
        Specified by:
        getZOrder in interface IScreenObject
        Returns:
        Returns the z-order of the screen object. Objects with higher z-orders are given preference in hit-testing.
